data.system_settings: Android Oreo on a Pixel C
data.actual_result: The app is taking around 2 seconds to redraw it's contents which makes an undesirable user experience.
data.expected_result: The app should redraw its contents quickly without any considerable delays.
data.short_description: A gap is seen during window resizing in split-screen mode
data.steps_to_repro: - Launch the app. - Put the device into split-screen mode. - Click on "+" icon in the "general" text channel. - Click on the camera icon to show camera preview. - Resize the split screen window.
